de.polygonal.ds.Visitable

type
interface
Specifies that a class can be visited in an iteration.

Instance Methods

visit(preflight : Bool, userData : Dynamic) : Bool

parameters
userData Data passed to every visited element. Default value is null.
If preflight is true, the return value specifies if the element implementing Visitable will be included in the traversal (true) or excluded from the traversal (false). If preflight is false, the return value determines if the traversal should continue (true) or stop immediately (false).
